name: Turntable Dust Cover Cozy - Tugboat
description:
PROTECT your beloved turntable dust cover from scratches, dust and your friends keys and iphones! 
Inspired by Galaxie 500's 'Tugboat' - doesn't want to vote for your president, just wants to be your turntable dustcover. 

Made from recycled sweaters.
Our dust cover cozy's fit snuggly over the dust cover of your turntable. 
This turntable dust cover cozy fits universally on most standard turntables:
Dimensions: 20" x 15.25" x 3.5"
Music Hall(s) 7.0, 7.1, 5.0, 5.1, 3.0, 3.1
Audio Technica ATLP120 
Technics SL-1200MK2 

*Special Orders for sizing available while supplies last - or order custom designs that fit your mojo mood.

artists.name: The artist formerly known as Prince

name: Lp Record Bag - The Fairport
description:
LP/Record bag holds a quantity of (25) twenty five wopping 12" LPs. 

Made from recycled sweaters and hemp. Inspired by the whimsical sounds of Fairport Convention - Lets meet on the ledge with friends, records, and maybe even Tam Lin

name: Lp Record Bag - The Bread
description:
LP/Record bag holds a quantity of (15) Fifteen 12" LPs. 

Made from recycled sweaters and hemp. Inspired by the floating tenor voice of David Gates of Bread - This bag will shelter your records from harm and keep them warm, keep them warmmmmm....

name: Lp Record Bag - The Blunstone
description:
LP/Record bag holds a quantity of (20) twenty 12" LPs. 

Made from recycled hemp and jute. Inspired by the honey voiced Colin Blunstone - This bag makes a statement; Tell her NO and say YES to this bag, which may make you believe in miracles after all...

name: LP Record Bag - The Nico
description:
The Nico LP/Record bag holds a quantity of (15) fifteen 12" LPs. 

Made from a recycled sweater and a pot holder. Inspired by that Femme Fatale, Nico of the Velvet Underground. This bag says sophistication, aloof and enigmatic, much like her voice and legendary beauty

name: Lp Record Bag - The Satchmo
description:
The BOSS LP/Record bag holds a quantity of (25) twenty five wopping 12" LPs. 

Made from recycled sweaters and jute. Inspired by the great Louis Armstrong - The Satchmo says sophistication while reminding you...its a wonderful world

name: Lp Record Bag - The Emmylou
description:
This LP/Record bag holds a quantity of 20 12" LPs. 
Made from recycled poly/cotton and an old lace curtain. Inspired by Blackhawk, by Emmylou Harris; a small town hero never dies - he fades a bit and then he slips...this bag over his shoulder!

name: LP Record Bag - The Beefheart
description:
This LP/Record bag holds a quantity of 15 12" LPs. 
Made from recycled poly/cotton afghan. While creating this bag - we listened to a lot of Captain Beefheart. Something odd, something beautiful, something perfect.

The stars are matter, We're matter, But it doesn't matter.

name: LP Record Bag - The Francoise
description:
This LP/Record bag holds a quantity of (20) twenty 12" LPs. 

Made from recycled jute and a recycled poly/cotton sweater vest, reminiscent of the air of je ne sais quoi about that unforgettable french style icon, Francoise Hardy

name: LP Record Bag - The Karen
description:
This LP/Record bag holds a quantity of 25 12" LPs. 

Made from recycled jute, hemp and a recycled wool/cotton sweater reminiscent of the honey-voiced chanteuse and easy-listening icon, Karen Carpenter.

name: Lp Record Bag - The Grand Funk
description:
LP/Record bag holds a quantity of (15) Fifteen 12" LPs. 

Made from recycled sweaters. Inspired by the fuzzed out blues riffs of the great Grand Funk Railroad - Lets get this thing on the move!
